<app-header>
  <app-button [buttonText]="headerButtonText"></app-button>
</app-header>
<div class="app-root">
  <!-- Search component -->
 <!-- <app-search></app-search> -->

<!-- <app-info [text]="appInfoText" [title]="appInfoTitle">
	<app-button [buttonText]="appInfoButtonText" [iconName]="buttonIconName"></app-button>
</app-info> -->

  <!-- Course Card component -->
<!-- <app-courses-list>
  <app-course-card></app-course-card>
</app-courses-list> -->

  <!-- Login Form component -->
<app-login-form></app-login-form>

  <!-- Login Form component -->
<app-registration-form></app-registration-form>

  <!-- Login Form component -->
<app-course-form></app-course-form>

  <!-- Modal component -->
